content.prompt: Dr. Ofori is helping a client who reports feeling overly stressed due to a heavy workload. Dr. Ofori believes an important first step is to help reframe the situation so that the client will see the workload as a challenge to be overcome rather than as an obstacle. This is most consistent with which treatment orientation?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
